name: Eburus
description:
Eburus is a website that provides content, resources, and tools to help people take care of their parents and aging loved ones. This is a growing problem In 2012, one in seven Canadians was a senior and, as a whole, seniors accounted for nearly half of all public sector health care costs. By 2030, almost one in four Canadians will be a senior citizen. While this is not a sexy problem, it is a glaring one and we intend to solve it.  

Learn more at Eburus.com or check out our facebook group at https://www.facebook.com/groups/careforelderly/

team.name: Ali Jiwani
team.bioHtml: Product @Babylon Health • Founder @Entrepreneur First, @MealSurfers (acquired) @SmartLabs • Prev PM @Zalando SE • consultant/VC @Royal Bank of Canada @UWO

jobs.title: Cofounder
jobs.description: Looking for a cofounder - technical or not technical with an interest in senior care. Currently offering only equity but will eventually raise if the right time is put together.
jobs.descriptionHtml: Looking for a cofounder - technical or not technical with an interest in senior care. Currently offering only equity but will eventually raise if the right time is put together.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for an entrepreneurially minded marketing intern who can help grow our business. The role provides exposure to our current and future customers, and engages with the cofounding team and investor base. It also allows for flexibility if you're in school, working, or starting your own business. Compensation can be negotiated.

High priority tasks for now are:
- Online and digital marketing funnels
- Facebook group management - this might sound easy but it is the core of one of our products
- Partnership development
- Investor updates

If you're interested in elder care and want to help solve some of the major challenges in this space, please reach out.
